page.title: 19LEISURE TIME IN AYMESTREY
page.content: Most of the outdoor activities of the people of the area are self contained, walking, gardening, cycling, riding angling, shooting; with reading, TV, music, knitting and embroidery the usual sedentary ones. The farmers of the area aver they have no leisure time, the odd hours in the pub playing darts and quoits and discussing their plight is part of the job! Less widespread but illustrating the variety of people are: choral singing, golf, old-time dancing, car rallying, morris dancing, dog breeding, skating and re-enacting Civil War Battles. Facilities for all these being found somewhere in the neighbourhood. Mixed craft classes are held in the Village Hall when instruction is given in a variety of crafts, furniture restoring being popular. Swimming is catered for in Leominster & Ludlow.
